definition: enemy/to be a match for/to rival/to resist/to withstand

square/power or involution (math.)/upright/honest/fair and square/direction/side/party (to a contract, dispute etc)/place/method/prescription (medicine)/just when/only or just/classifier for square things/abbr. for square or cubic meter

sentences.english: The sophisticated system destroys enemy warheads through direct "hit-to-kill" technology. "It's like hitting a bullet with a bullet," Watkins says.
sentences.chinese: 系統利用命中即摧毀技術，摧毀敵方的彈頭。

sentences.english: Saab’s ARTHUR radar system locates incoming enemy projectiles and missiles.
sentences.chinese: ARTHUR雷達系統可定位敵方來襲炮彈和導彈。

sentences.english: Our radio communications have been intercepted by the enemy.
sentences.chinese: 我方的無線通信被敵方竊聽了。

sentences.english: Our warships bottled up the enemy fleet in the harbour.
sentences.chinese: 我方軍艦把敵方艦隊圍困在港口內。

sentences.english: If you failed to support Britain, you were assisting the enemy.
sentences.chinese: 如果你不支持英國，那你就是協助敵方。

sentences.english: Twelve enemy transport aircraft on the handstand were knocked out by mortar shells.
sentences.chinese: 停機坪上的十二架敵方運輸機被迫擊炮彈擊毀了。

sentences.english: A warship involved in a battle would encounter the assault from enemy anti-warship weapons.
sentences.chinese: 艦船在海戰時，會遭到敵方反艦武器的攻擊。

sentences.english: He wanted to see if he could catch sight of the rival submarine.
sentences.chinese: 他想看看能否掃到敵方潛水艇一眼。

sentences.english: The two armies converge on the enemy capital for the last battle of the war.
sentences.chinese: 兩軍聚集在敵方首都，準備一決勝負。

sentences.english: Strangles the soul of a target enemy unit and extracts bits and pieces of it.
sentences.chinese: 勒緊一個敵方單位的靈魂，將他壓榨出來。

sentences.english: The soldier looped a grenade into the enemy shelter trench.
sentences.chinese: 士兵將一枚手榴彈呈弧形拋進敵方掩蔽壕裏。

sentences.english: Stories like these were invented to damage enemy morale.
sentences.chinese: 這樣的消息，向壁虛構，無非是要打擊敵方士氣。

sentences.english: Seeing such a terrible sight before his eyes, he was savaged by his enemy's atrocity.
sentences.chinese: 看到眼前這可怖的場景，他被敵方的暴行激怒了。

sentences.english: Specifies frames used when the infantry unit is standing and firing at an enemy unit.
sentences.chinese: 指定當步兵單位站着向敵方單位開火的幀序列。

sentences.english: It could engage the enemy beyond the range of hostile torpedoes.
sentences.chinese: 從這可以避開敵方魚雷區對敵人發動進攻。

sentences.english: The war was carried into enemy territory.
sentences.chinese: 戰爭已伸展到敵方領土。

definition: Huang Zhong (-220), general of Shu in Romance of the Three Kingdoms, portrayed as an old fighter
to make a comeback/(of a doctor's assessment of the gender of a fetus) to turn out to be wrong
to mount a sneak attack/to raid
to go against the wind/contrary wind/a headwind
to control/to curb/to restrict/to impede/to pin down (enemy troops)
to march straight in unchallenged (military) (idiom)/(fig.) to push deep into the heart of sth/to flood in
